titleStmt.title: Israel's troubles and triumph, or, The history of their dangers in and deliverance out of Egypt as it is recorded by Moses in Exod. and turned into English verse by George Lesly.
titleStmt.author: Lesly, George, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by Nicholas Woolf ...,
